comments:
I'm using release 2.1.1

Dunno, what you could use for additional information, so just feel free to ask
:-). The following exception is from the .log file.

Error seems to be connected to the Merant PVCS WSAD/Eclipse Plugin (Version
Manager 7.5.1.5 / Tracker 7.5.1). When deactivating it the workbench starts up.

You can not create more than one drop target for the same widget.  The error 
indicates that a second drop target is being created for the tree in the 
OutlineView.  This is not allowed by SWT.

This bug report should be filed against the Merant PVCS WSAD/Eclipse Plugin.
We've forwarded the information to Merant for further investigation.

I am going to mark this bug report as a duplicate of bug 29258.

I think StructuredViewer needs a mechanism for multiple plugins to extend the 
DND behaviour rather than having them try and create their own DropTarget.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 29258 ***

bug seems to be fixed with merant tracker 7.5.2 and setting an environment
variable(!). no problems after having upgraded to the above mentioned version.
